name: Frog Finder
description:
A cute lightweight puzzle game. Can you find the frog? 🐸

  • 🐸 Several different types of unique randomly generated puzzles!🐸
  • 🐸 No in-game text! No instructions! ...Figuring out the rules is half the fun!🐸
  • 🐸 Tons of frogs!🐸
  • 🐸 Tons of original music!🐸
  • 🐸 Fun for all ages. Yes, really! 🐸

Thank you for playing my game 🐸 Go find those frogs!
